navigation.default_navigation_mode_activated: Navigation On: Use arrow keys to select preceding (←) or succeding (→) elements. Use the up (↑) and down (↓) arrows to navigate paths. Press 'N' to exit.
navigation.default_navigation_mode_deactivated: Navigation Off: Press 'N' for default navigation, 'ALT+N' for position based navigation.
navigation.local_navigation_mode_activated: Position based Nav On: Navigate nearest elements using arrow keys: (↑) for above, (↓) for below, (←) for previous, (→) for next. Press 'N' to exit. Press 'ALT+N' to exit.
navigation.local_navigation_mode_deactivated: Position based Nav Off: Press 'N' for default navigation, 'ALT+N' for position based navigation.
